thread.title: Serge Gnabry eyeing Arsenal return? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
thread.title_full: Serge Gnabry eyeing Arsenal return? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Serge Gnabry eyeing Arsenal return? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
text:
Serge Gnabry eyeing Arsenal return? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers PLUS: Everton and Liverpool to do battle over Uruguayan wonderkid as Premier League strugglers eye further reinforcements Share Gnabry has impressed for Bremen (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) Share Get football     
Serge Gnabry has hinted he could return to Arsenal. 
The German winger left the Gunners in the summer and has impressed with Werder Bremen, scoring 10 goals in 16 appearances. 
And he has admitted he would be open to a return to English football. 
"For my future, I’ve decided to focus on how I play now and today. But what happens in the future depends on my performance," he told Bild. 
"What if Chelsea or Arsenal come knocking? Well, at the moment I’m trying to give everything to Werder." 
Here are Monday's other top stories ... Top stories from the Daily Mirror
